wpt.name: GCYG4Q
wpt.desc: First Bell by zgrav, Traditional Cache (3/2)

groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:name: First Bell
groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:short_description: This traditional cache is in a small interior neighborhood park. NEW CONTAINER, NEW LOCATION Sept 12, 2010
groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:long_description:
The cache is now a small nalgene bottle with small wacky trade items (nuts and bolts, odd hardware). The park has been extensively landscaped and improved since I placed my first geocache hide here. The giant tree on the knoll also toppled during a storm earlier this summer, and further changed the hiding area. Tucked away in an igneous spot. Three trails lead to the park from the coordinates given below. The park is surrounded by houses, and closes at dark. Please limit searches to daylight times and be discrete if children are using the playground. Access is from paved trails at:

1. 38 51 39.86 w 77 10 22.14

2. 38 51 45.75 w 77 10 21.73

3. 38 51 44.34 w 77 10 16.57

NOTICE: Please be respectful of the posted park hours. If you enter the park after hours you are trespassing. If you are stopped you can be ticketed or arrested and will put the future of geocaching in the parks in jeopardy.
groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:encoded_hints: Close to the Big Red Three.
